name: Andrea
title: Software Developer
bio: Creative developer with passion for digital art and technological innovation. I create unique web experiences that combine functionality and aesthetic beauty.

experience.title: Developer - System Administrator
experience.description: Development of modern web applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript. Focus on user experience and performance. Repair of mobile devices, personal computers, etc. Website creation.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Creation and collaboration in the development of mobile applications using React Native.

education.description: Specialization in software development and user interfaces.

projects.name: Gestionale Energy
projects.description: Gestionale Energy is a management software specialized in automating business processes related to the production of plastic bales. The platform allows complete management of the production cycle, from creation to traceability of the bales, integrating real-time monitoring of ongoing activities. It also includes data analysis tools to assess overall production performance, optimize resources, and improve operational efficiency.

projects.name: ListShot (by Gate Away)
projects.description: ListShot is a smart application for real estate management that leverages artificial intelligence to automate the generation of property information. Based on uploaded images, the system analyzes and automatically identifies key features of the property (e.g., type, condition, rooms, materials), quickly and accurately compiling descriptive sheets, listings, and reports. ListShot simplifies and speeds up the work of agents and industry professionals, reducing human error and improving operational efficiency in publishing and managing properties.
